gaffer.serialisation.simple.raw

Class RawLongSerialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaffer.serialisation.simple.raw.RawLongSerialiser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serialisation, Serializable

    public class RawLongSerialiser
extends Object
implements Serialisation
    RawLongSerialiser serialises Longs into a little-endian byte array. It's significantly faster than LongSerialiser, but potentially uses much more space.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
